snippet: The men, who were arrested last month and indicted this week, are accused of conspiring and attempting to provide material support to the organization also known as the Islamic State.
abstract: Brooklyn men Abdurasul Hasanovich Juraboev, Akhror Saidakhmetov and Abror Habibov, who are accused of plotting to join Islamic State, plead not guilty to terrorism-related charges.
lead_paragraph: The men, who were arrested last month and indicted this week, are accused of conspiring and attempting to provide material support to the organization also known as the Islamic State.

headline.main: 3 Brooklyn Men Accused of Plotting to Aid ISIS Plead Not Guilty
headline.print_headline: Men Plead Not Guilty in ISIS Case in Brooklyn

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
